query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 «Osanna, sanctus Deus sabaòth, 2 superillustrans claritate tua 3 felices ignes horum malacòth!».
query.error: **English:** 1 "Hosanna, holy God of hosts, 2 supremely illuminating with your brightness 3 the happy fires of these heavens!".
query.result: 1 "Hosanna, Tuhan semesta alam yang suci, 2 sangat terang benderang dengan cahaya-Mu 3 api-api yang bahagia dari langit-langit ini!".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
4 Così, volgendosi a la nota sua, 5 fu viso a me cantare essa sustanza, 6 sopra la qual doppio lume s’addua;
query.error: **English:** 4 Thus, turning to her song, 5 that substance appeared to me singing, 6 upon which a double light was shining;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 ed essa e l’altre mossero a sua danza, 8 e quasi velocissime faville 9 mi si velar di sùbita distanza.
query.error: **English:** 7 and she and the others moved to her dance, 8 and like extremely swift sparks 9 they veiled themselves from me with sudden distance.
query.result: 7 dan dia dan yang lainnya bergerak mengikuti tariannya, 8 dan bagai percikan api yang sangat cepat 9 mereka menyembunyikan diri dariku dengan jarak yang tiba-tiba.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 Io dubitava e dicea ‘Dille, dille!’ 11 fra me, ‘dille’ dicea, ‘a la mia donna 12 che mi diseta con le dolci stille’.
query.error: **English:** 10 I hesitated and said, ‘Tell her, tell her!’ 11 to myself, ‘tell her,’ I said, ‘to my lady 12 who nourishes me with her sweet words.’
query.result: 10 Aku ragu-ragu dan berkata, ‘Katakan padanya, katakan padanya!’ 11 dalam hatiku, ‘katakan,’ kataku, ‘kepada kekasihku 12 yang menyegarkanku dengan kata-katanya yang manis.’

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
13 Ma quella reverenza che s’indonna 14 di tutto me, pur per Be e per ice, 15 mi richinava come l’uom ch’assonna.
query.error: **English:** 13 But that reverence which overcame me, 14 even for Beatrice and for Virgil, 15 bent me down like a man who is drowsy.
query.result: 13 Tetapi rasa hormat yang merasuki 14 seluruh diriku, bahkan untuk Beatrice dan untuk Virgil, 15 membungkukanku seperti orang yang mengantuk.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
16 Poco sofferse me cotal Beatrice 17 e cominciò, raggiandomi d’un riso 18 tal, che nel foco faria l’uom felice:
query.error: **English:** 16 Beatrice suffered me thus for a short while, 17 and began, beaming at me with a smile 18 such that it would make a man happy in the fire:
query.result: 16 Beatrice menderita aku seperti itu untuk sementara waktu, 17 dan mulailah, menyinariku dengan senyuman 18 sedemikian rupa sehingga akan membuat seseorang bahagia dalam api:

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 «Secondo mio infallibile avviso, 20 come giusta vendetta giustamente 21 punita fosse, t’ha in pensier miso;
query.error: **English:** 19 "According to my infallible judgment, 20 how justly vengeance was justly 21 inflicted, has put you in thought;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
22 ma io ti solverò tosto la mente; 23 e tu ascolta, ché le mie parole 24 di gran sentenza ti faran presente.
query.error: **English:** 22 but I will quickly free your mind; 23 and you listen, for my words 24 will make you aware of a great truth.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
25 Per non soffrire a la virtù che vole 26 freno a suo prode, quell’ uom che non nacque, 27 dannando sé, dannò tutta sua prole;
query.error: **English:** 25 In order not to suffer the virtue that wills 26 a bridle for its own good, that man who was not born, 27 damning himself, damned all his offspring;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
28 onde l’umana specie inferma giacque 29 giù per secoli molti in grande errore, 30 fin ch’al Verbo di Dio discender piacque
query.error: **English:** 28 whence the infirm human race lay 29 down through many centuries in great error, 30 until it pleased the Word of God to descend
query.result: 28 sehingga ras manusia yang lemah terbaring 29 selama berabad-abad dalam kesalahan besar, 30 hingga berkenanlah Firman Tuhan untuk turun

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
31 u’ la natura, che dal suo fattore 32 s’era allungata, unì a sé in persona 33 con l’atto sol del suo etterno amore.
query.error: **English:** 31 where nature, which had been separated from its maker, 32 united itself to him in person 33 with the sole act of his eternal love.
query.result: 31 di mana alam, yang telah terpisah dari penciptanya, 32 menyatukan dirinya dengannya secara pribadi 33 dengan tindakan tunggal kasih abadi-Nya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
34 Or drizza il viso a quel ch’or si ragiona: 35 questa natura al suo fattore unita, 36 qual fu creata, fu sincera e buona;
query.error: **English:** 34 Now turn your face to that which is being spoken of: 35 this nature, united with its creator, 36 as it was created, was pure and good;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
37 ma per sé stessa pur fu ella sbandita 38 di paradiso, però che si torse 39 da via di verità e da sua vita.
query.error: **English:** 37 but by itself it was banished 38 from paradise, because it turned away 39 from the path of truth and from its life.
query.result: 37 tetapi dengan sendirinya ia diusir 38 dari surga, karena ia berpaling 39 dari jalan kebenaran dan dari kehidupannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
40 La pena dunque che la croce porse 41 s’a la natura assunta si misura, 42 nulla già mai sì giustamente morse;
query.error: **English:** 40 Therefore, the suffering that the cross inflicted 41 if measured against the nature assumed, 42 never was anything so justly punished;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
43 e così nulla fu di tanta ingiura, 44 guardando a la persona che sofferse, 45 in che era contratta tal natura.
query.error: **English:** 43 and so nothing was ever so wronged, 44 considering the person who suffered, 45 in whom such a nature was contracted.
query.result: 43 dan tidak ada yang pernah begitu dianiaya, 44 melihat kepada pribadi yang menderita, 45 yang di dalamnya sifat tersebut dikontrak.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
46 Però d’un atto uscir cose diverse: 47 ch’a Dio e a’ Giudei piacque una morte; 48 per lei tremò la terra e ’l ciel s’aperse.
query.error: **English:** 46 But from one act diverse things came forth: 47 for to God and to the Jews one death was pleasing; 48 because of it the earth trembled and the sky opened up.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
49 Non ti dee oramai parer più forte, 50 quando si dice che giusta vendetta 51 poscia vengiata fu da giusta corte.
query.error: **English:** 49 It should not seem too hard for you now, 50 when it is said that just vengeance 51 was later avenged by a just court.
query.result: 49 Tidak seharusnya terlihat terlalu sulit bagimu sekarang, 50 ketika dikatakan bahwa pembalasan yang adil 51 kemudian dibalaskan oleh pengadilan yang adil.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
52 Ma io veggi’ or la tua mente ristretta 53 di pensiero in pensier dentro ad un nodo, 54 del qual con gran disio solver s’aspetta.
query.error: **English:** 52 But I now see your mind constricted 53 from thought to thought within a knot, 54 from which with great desire it awaits release.
query.result: 52 Tetapi sekarang kulihat pikiranmu yang terbatas 53 dari pikiran ke pikiran dalam sebuah simpul, 54 dari mana dengan keinginan besar ia menanti pembebasan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
55 Tu dici: “Ben discerno ciò ch’i’ odo; 56 ma perché Dio volesse, m’è occulto, 57 a nostra redenzion pur questo modo”.
query.error: **English:** 55 You say: “I understand well what I hear; 56 but why God willed it, is hidden from me, 57 for our redemption, even in this way”.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
58 Questo decreto, frate, sta sepulto 59 a li occhi di ciascuno il cui ingegno 60 ne la fiamma d’amor non è adulto.
query.error: **English:** 58 This decree, brother, is hidden 59 from the eyes of everyone whose intellect 60 is not mature in the flame of love.
query.result: 58 Keputusan ini, saudara, terkubur 59 dari pandangan setiap orang yang kecerdasannya 60 tidak matang dalam api cinta.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
61 Veramente, però ch’a questo segno 62 molto si mira e poco si discerne, 63 dirò perché tal modo fu più degno.
query.error: **English:** 61 Truly, however, at this sign 62 much is seen and little is discerned, 63 I will say why such a way was more worthy.
query.result: 61 Sungguh, namun pada tanda ini 62 banyak yang dilihat dan sedikit yang terlihat, 63 akan kukatakan mengapa cara seperti itu lebih berharga.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
64 La divina bontà, che da sé sperne 65 ogne livore, ardendo in sé, sfavilla 66 sì che dispiega le bellezze etterne.
query.error: **English:** 64 The divine goodness, which spurns from itself 65 all ill-will, burning within itself, sparkles 66 so that it unfolds the eternal beauties.
query.result: 64 Kebaikan ilahi, yang dari dirinya sendiri menolak 65 segala kedengkian, berkobar dalam dirinya, bersinar 66 sehingga ia menyingkapkan keindahan abadi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
67 Ciò che da lei sanza mezzo distilla 68 non ha poi fine, perché non si move 69 la sua imprenta quand’ ella sigilla.
query.error: **English:** 67 That which distills from it without means 68 has no end, because its imprint does not move 69 when it seals.
query.result: 67 Apa yang menitis darinya tanpa perantara 68 tidak ada akhirnya, karena jejaknya tidak bergerak 69 ketika ia menyegel.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
70 Ciò che da essa sanza mezzo piove 71 libero è tutto, perché non soggiace 72 a la virtute de le cose nove.
query.error: **English:** 70 That which rains down from it without means 71 is all free, because it is not subject 72 to the power of new things.
query.result: 70 Apa yang turun darinya tanpa perantara 71 semuanya bebas, karena tidak tunduk 72 pada kuasa hal-hal yang baru.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
73 Più l’è conforme, e però più le piace; 74 ché l’ardor santo ch’ogne cosa raggia, 75 ne la più somigliante è più vivace.
query.error: **English:** 73 The more it conforms, the more it pleases her; 74 for the holy ardor that radiates everything 75 is more vivid in that which is most similar.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
76 Di tutte queste dote s’avvantaggia 77 l’umana creatura, e s’una manca, 78 di sua nobilità convien che caggia.
query.error: **English:** 76 In all these gifts, the human creature 77 excels, and if one is lacking, 78 it is necessary that his nobility fall.
query.result: 76 Dalam semua karunia ini, makhluk manusia 77 lebih unggul, dan jika satu kurang, 78 maka bangsawannya harus jatuh.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
79 Solo il peccato è quel che la disfranca 80 e falla dissimìle al sommo bene, 81 per che del lume suo poco s’imbianca;
query.error: **English:** 79 Only sin is that which disfranchises her 80 and makes her dissimilar to the supreme good, 81 because she is illumined little by its light;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
82 e in sua dignità mai non rivene, 83 se non rïempie, dove colpa vòta, 84 contra mal dilettar con giuste pene.
query.error: **English:** 82 and she never returns to her dignity, 83 unless she fills up, where fault empties, 84 against evil delight with just punishments.
query.result: 82 dan ia tidak pernah kembali kepada martabatnya, 83 kecuali ia mengisi, di mana kesalahan dikosongkan, 84 melawan kesenangan jahat dengan hukuman yang adil.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
85 Vostra natura, quando peccò tota 86 nel seme suo, da queste dignitadi, 87 come di paradiso, fu remota;
query.error: **English:** 85 Your nature, when it sinned totally 86 in its seed, was removed from these dignities, 87 as from paradise;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
88 né ricovrar potiensi, se tu badi 89 ben sottilmente, per alcuna via, 90 sanza passar per un di questi guadi:
query.error: **English:** 88 nor can you recover them, if you consider 89 subtly enough, by any way, 90 without passing through one of these fords:
query.result: 88 dan tidak dapat dipulihkan, jika kamu pertimbangkan 89 dengan cukup saksama, dengan cara apa pun, 90 tanpa melewati salah satu dari arungan ini:

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
91 o che Dio solo per sua cortesia 92 dimesso avesse, o che l’uom per sé isso 93 avesse sodisfatto a sua follia.
query.error: **English:** 91 either that God alone through his courtesy 92 had remitted, or that man by himself 93 had made satisfaction for his folly.
query.result: 91 atau bahwa Tuhan sendiri melalui kebaikan-Nya 92 telah mengampuni, atau bahwa manusia dengan dirinya sendiri 93 telah memberikan kepuasan atas kebodohannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
94 Ficca mo l’occhio per entro l’abisso 95 de l’etterno consiglio, quanto puoi 96 al mio parlar distrettamente fisso.
query.error: **English:** 94 Now fix your gaze into the abyss 95 of the eternal counsel, as much as you can, 96 with your attention firmly fixed on my words.
query.result: 94 Sekarang tataplah ke dalam jurang 95 nasihat abadi, sebanyak yang kamu mampu, 96 dengan perhatianmu yang tertuju pada kata-kataku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
97 Non potea l’uomo ne’ termini suoi 98 mai sodisfar, per non potere ir giuso 99 con umiltate obedïendo poi,
query.error: **English:** 97 Man could not satisfy [God's] terms 98 ever by going down 99 with humility, obeying afterwards,
query.result: 97 Manusia tidak dapat memenuhi syarat-syarat-Nya 98 selamanya dengan turun 99 dengan kerendahan hati, mematuhi setelahnya,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
100 quanto disobediendo intese ir suso; 101 e questa è la cagion per che l’uom fue 102 da poter sodisfar per sé dischiuso.
query.error: **English:** 100 as much as he intended to go up by disobeying; 101 and this is the reason why man was 102 allowed to satisfy [God] for himself.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
103 Dunque a Dio convenia con le vie sue 104 riparar l’omo a sua intera vita, 105 dico con l’una, o ver con amendue.
query.error: **English:** 103 Therefore it was necessary for God, with His ways, 104 to restore man to his complete life, 105 I say with one, or indeed with both.
query.result: 103 Oleh itu perlu bagi Tuhan, dengan jalan-jalan-Nya, 104 untuk memulihkan manusia kepada kehidupan yang lengkap, 105 kukatakan dengan yang satu, atau bahkan dengan keduanya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
106 Ma perché l’ovra tanto è più gradita 107 da l’operante, quanto più appresenta 108 de la bontà del core ond’ ell’ è uscita,
query.error: **English:** 106 But because the work is all the more pleasing 107 to the worker, the more it shows 108 the goodness of the heart from which it came forth,
query.result: 106 Tetapi karena pekerjaan itu jauh lebih menyenangkan 107 bagi yang mengerjakannya, semakin banyak menunjukkan 108 kebaikan hati dari mana pekerjaan itu muncul,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
109 la divina bontà che ’l mondo imprenta, 110 di proceder per tutte le sue vie, 111 a rilevarvi suso, fu contenta.
query.error: **English:** 109 the divine goodness that imprints the world, 110 was pleased to proceed through all its ways, 111 to raise you up on high.
query.result: 109 kebaikan ilahi yang membekas di dunia, 110 untuk melanjutkan melalui semua jalannya, 111 untuk mengangkatmu ke atas, merasa senang.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
112 Né tra l’ultima notte e ’l primo die 113 sì alto o sì magnifico processo, 114 o per l’una o per l’altra, fu o fie:
query.error: **English:** 112 Neither between the last night and the first day 113 was there ever so high or so magnificent a process, 114 either for one or for the other, or will there ever be:
query.result: 112 Tidak antara malam terakhir dan hari pertama 113 proses yang begitu tinggi atau begitu agung, 114 baik untuk yang satu atau yang lain, pernah ada atau akan ada:

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
115 ché più largo fu Dio a dar sé stesso 116 per far l’uom sufficiente a rilevarsi, 117 che s’elli avesse sol da sé dimesso;
query.error: **English:** 115 for God was more generous in giving Himself 116 to make man sufficient to rise again, 117 than if He had only humbled Himself;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
118 e tutti li altri modi erano scarsi 119 a la giustizia, se ’l Figliuol di Dio 120 non fosse umilïato ad incarnarsi.
query.error: **English:** 118 and all other ways were insufficient 119 for justice, if the Son of God 120 had not humbled Himself to become incarnate.
query.result: 118 dan semua cara lainnya tidak cukup 119 untuk keadilan, jika Putra Tuhan 120 tidak merendahkan Diri-Nya untuk menjelma menjadi manusia.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
121 Or per empierti bene ogne disio, 122 ritorno a dichiararti in alcun loco, 123 perché tu veggi lì così com’ io.
query.error: **English:** 121 Now to fulfill every desire, 122 I return to declare to you in some place, 123 so that you may see there just as I do.
query.result: 121 Sekarang untuk memenuhi setiap keinginan, 122 aku kembali untuk menyatakan kepadamu di suatu tempat, 123 supaya kamu dapat melihat di sana sebagaimana yang kulihat.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
124 Tu dici: “Io veggio l’acqua, io veggio il foco, 125 l’aere e la terra e tutte lor misture 126 venire a corruzione, e durar poco;
query.error: **English:** 124 You say: “I see the water, I see the fire, 125 the air and the earth and all their mixtures 126 come to corruption, and last but a short while;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
127 e queste cose pur furon creature; 128 per che, se ciò ch’è detto è stato vero, 129 esser dovrien da corruzion sicure”.
query.error: **English:** 127 and these things were also created; 128 therefore, if what has been said is true, 129 they should be safe from corruption”.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
130 Li angeli, frate, e ’l paese sincero 131 nel qual tu se’, dir si posson creati, 132 sì come sono, in loro essere intero;
query.error: **English:** 130 The angels, brother, and the sincere country 131 in which you are, can be said to be created, 132 just as they are, in their entire being;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
133 ma li alimenti che tu hai nomati 134 e quelle cose che di lor si fanno 135 da creata virtù sono informati.
query.error: **English:** 133 but the foods that you have named 134 and those things that are made from them 135 are informed by created virtue.
query.result: 133 tetapi makanan-makanan yang telah engkau sebutkan 134 dan hal-hal yang dibuat dari mereka 135 dibentuk oleh kebajikan yang diciptakan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
136 Creata fu la materia ch’elli hanno; 137 creata fu la virtù informante 138 in queste stelle che ’ntorno a lor vanno.
query.error: **English:** 136 The matter from which they are made was created; 137 the informing virtue was created 138 in these stars that go around them.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
139 L’anima d’ogne bruto e de le piante 140 di complession potenzïata tira 141 lo raggio e ’l moto de le luci sante;
query.error: **English:** 139 The soul of every brute and of the plants 140 draws its potential power 141 from the ray and motion of the holy lights;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
142 ma vostra vita sanza mezzo spira 143 la somma beninanza, e la innamora 144 di sé sì che poi sempre la disira.
query.error: **English:** 142 but your life is breathed into you directly 143 by the supreme goodness, and it enkindles in you 144 such love for itself that you always desire it.
query.result: 142 tetapi hidup Anda dihembuskan langsung ke dalam diri Anda 143 oleh kebaikan tertinggi, dan itu menyalakan dalam diri Anda 144 cinta yang sedemikian rupa sehingga Anda selalu menginginkannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
145 E quinci puoi argomentare ancora 146 vostra resurrezion, se tu ripensi 147 come l’umana carne fessi allora
query.error: **English:** 145 And from this you can further reason 146 about your resurrection, if you think again 147 how human flesh made you then,
query.result: 145 Dan dari sini kamu dapat berargumentasi lebih lanjut 146 tentang kebangkitanmu, jika kamu berpikir lagi 147 bagaimana daging manusia menjadikanmu saat itu,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
148 che li primi parenti intrambo fensi».
query.error: **English:** 148 which both your first parents made.
query.result: 148 yang dibuat oleh kedua orang tua pertamamu.
